blackjack.daniel.ibanez

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • blackjack.daniel.ibanez.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlayerAI

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a player in a blackjack game. Base class for PlayerAI.

      • doubleIsAllowed

        public boolean doubleIsAllowed()
        Checks if player can double down.
        Returns:
        true if player can still double double, false otherwise

      • getHandValue

        public int getHandValue()
        Returns the sum of all values in the player's hand. The value of each card follows the blackjack standard.
        Returns:
        total value of the player's hand
